duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the overall curb appeal and cleanliness of the property through landscaping and property maintenance activities.
Perform daily property walks and inspections to identify areas for improvement and upkeep.
Assist with light cleaning and repairs, as well as preparing the property for seasonal weather changes.
Ensure adequate inventory of cleaning supplies and equipment, and conduct preventative maintenance on tools and equipment.
Listen and respond to the needs of residents and staff members, escalating communication as necessary to a supervisor.
Perform duties in accordance with all safety and OSHA requirements.
